cta.title: Ready to Start Your Project?
cta.description: Contact us today to discuss your project requirements and get a free quote.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our services and process.

items.question: How long does a typical project take?
items.answer: Project timelines vary depending on complexity and scope. A simple website might take 2-4 weeks, while a complex web application could take 2-6 months.

items.question: What is your payment structure?
items.answer: We typically require a 50% deposit to start the project, with the remaining 50% due upon completion. For larger projects, we may establish a milestone-based payment schedule.

items.question: Do you provide ongoing maintenance?
items.answer: Yes, we offer various maintenance packages to keep your website or application running smoothly after launch.

items.question: Can you help with content creation?
items.answer: We can provide basic content structure and guidance, but we recommend working with a professional copywriter for best results.

items.question: Do you offer hosting services?
items.answer: While we don't provide hosting directly, we can recommend reliable hosting providers and help with setup and configuration.
